Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Évaluation de l’impact des aides directes et indirectes à la R&D en France (Evaluation of the impact of direct and indirect support to R&D in France) (with M. Marino and S. Lhuillery). Study conducted for the French Ministry of Education and Research, 2014.

L’impact des réseaux sociaux sur le retour à l’emploi des chômeurs (The impact of social networks on re-employment) (with P. Arni, G. Bonoli, D. Oesch, R. Lalive, N. Turtschi, A. von Ow). Study conducted for the Swiss State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (SECO), 2014.
